src:
ＮＹダウ、２日ぶり最高値更新…２万７６７４ドル

07 Nov 2019, 22:12

　【ワシントン＝山内竜介】７日のニューヨーク株式市場で、ダウ平均株価（３０種）は２日ぶりに最高値を更新した。終値は前日比１８２・２４ドル高の２万７６７４・８０ドルだった。
　情報技術（ＩＴ）企業の銘柄が多いナスダック店頭市場の総合指数の終値は、２３・８９ポイント高の８４３４・５２だった。
text:
NY Dow, the highest price update in two days ... $ 27,664

07 Nov 2019, 22:12

[Washington = Ryusuke Yamauchi] The Dow average stock price (30 types) was the highest in two days in the New York stock market on the 7th. The closing price was $ 27,674,80, an increase of $ 182.24 compared to the previous day.
The closing price of the overall index of the Nasdaq over-the-counter market, which has many information technology (IT) companies, was 8434.52, 23.89 points higher.
